nodes.text: Dirha was a gritty industrial planet that was located within the Dirha system of the galaxy's Hutt Space region and lay on the hyperlane called the Sisar Run, which connected it to the world of Cyborrea and the Sespe system.

Dirha lay within the sphere of influence of the Vosadii kajidic, a clan of the Hutt species, and served as a refueling point for starships that traveled along the hyperlane toward the planets of Nimban and Nar Kreeta. After the military forces of the extra-galactic Yuuzhan Vong species invaded the Hutt Space, Dirha was terraformed by members of the species between 25 ABY and 29 ABY in a process called Vongforming.
Dirha was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the planet in grid square S-9.
